history.proof: intros. unfold disjs, Iter_orb. split. + intros H9. srun best use: disjs_orb unfold: Iter_orb, disjs. + intros H10 H11. hauto depth: 2 lq: on exh: on use: Iter_upb_period, expo_eq_exds_orb, exd_Iter_orb_upb, period_expo unfold: Iter_orb.

exceptions.tactic: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros H5 H6 z H7 H8.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold disjs, Iter_orb. intros H5 H6 z H7 H8. unfold not in H8. split. + intros H9. apply H8. apply exds_intro with z. * apply exds_intro with y. -- apply H5. -- apply H9. * apply H7. + intros H10 H11. destruct (H10 z) as [H12 | H12]; destruct (H11 z) as [H13 | H13]. * apply H2 in H12. apply H2 in H13. rewrite H12, H13. apply H9. * apply H3 in H13. contradiction. * apply H3 in H12. contradiction. *
